desc: Exclusive, affordable art for all. Limited-editions, hand-embellished works and originals. From London art, icon art, dog art, animal art to a stunning collection of buddha and Ganesh art. Art by Amber-Jane Raab plus collaborations with outstanding artists, as well as collections made for RARE by our favourite artists.

layout.text: The home of artist Amber-Jane Raab, featuring exclusive works and favourites from selected artists. Step inside and enjoy!
